Hairbrush with built-in LED lights: A hairbrush with LED lights integrated into the bristles can provide illumination while brushing, making it easier to see and style hair in low light conditions.
Hairbrush with detangling spray: A hairbrush with a detangling spray dispenser built-in can help to easily detangle hair without the need for a separate product.
Hairbrush with temperature control: A hairbrush with temperature control can help to style hair at the perfect temperature, preventing damage and ensuring a healthy look.
Hairbrush with multiple bristle types: A hairbrush with multiple bristle types can provide different textures and styles for different hair types, making it a versatile tool for all hair types.
Hairbrush with a smartphone app: A hairbrush with a smartphone app can provide personalized styling recommendations and track hair growth and health over time.
